name: Lovestruck - A Yandere Simulator Fangame
description:
Lovestruck: A Yandere Simulator Dating Sim featuring the April Fools' Day Male Rivals.  Built with Ren'py.

Current features:

  • Fully-fledged intro cutscene, with backgrounds,  music, and a rudimentary sprite for each character. 
  • Fully-fledged tutorial, to teach the player how to play the game and what the gameplay is like. 
  • Basic day cyle, with several events and choices, to give the player a sense of what the full game will be like when it is complete.
  • All the gameplay is probably changing soon.

Check the Devlog for build history and what's changed and all that. The past 3 builds for each platform will be available, and the least recent of the three will be deleted each update.
